arts.ttl: Kieran Tierney in Celtic statement as Kilmarnock thumped to leave next boss question lingering – 5 talking points
arts.sum: The Hoops cut the gap at the top to seven points as they thumped Stuart Kettlewell's men 4-0

arts.ttl: CELTIC 4 KILMARNOCK 0: IT’S CHAMPS TO THE FOUR
arts.sum: CELTIC 4 KILMARNOCK 0 KIERAN TIERNEY hit a cracker for his first goal since his return to Celtic on the summer after his six-year absence on an afternoon where the champions fired in four without replay and moved seven points closer to Hearts. The Hoops were already leading through an early strike from Johnny Kenny [...]

arts.ttl: Celtic vs Kilmarnock LIVE as Simpson-Pusey handed surprise start by Martin O'Neill
arts.sum: It's back to league action for the champions as they take on struggling Kilmarnock at Parkhead

Second-placed Celtic take on Kilmarnock at Parkhead on Sunday afternoon, as the Hoops - who are hoping to keep pressure on league leaders Hearts - host a Killie side that are dropping like a stone. C...

arts.ttl: Celtic vs Kilmarnock – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Celtic and Kilmarnock go head-to-head at Celtic Park on Sunday afternoon in a crucial Scottish Premiership encounter. The hosts will be looking to bounce back from their midweek Europa League disappointment. Kilmarnock, meanwhile, are desperate to end a worrying run of defeats that has seen them slip down the table. arts.sum: Celtic will host Kilmarnock this Sunday at Celtic Park in an important Scottish Premiership fixture for both sides. The home side will be eager to recover from their recent setback in the Europa League, while Kilmarnock are determined to halt a troubling sequence of losses that has pushed them down the league standings. arts.ttl: All 6 Scottish Premiership weekend predictions - Week 12
arts.sum: After last week's Scottish League Cup action, all 12 teams are back in action in the Scottish Premiership this week and Tom Hill has made a prediction for every match.
